DIA_Ambrosia_Hello_03_02: I guarantee I can do a lot.
DIA_Ambrosia_Search_15_01: I'm looking for a guy who wears a ponytail. Maybe you met him here?
DIA_Ambrosia_Search_03_02: Since I've been working here, I've seen a lot of men.
DIA_Ambrosia_Search_03_03: I don't recall anyone with that hairstyle showing up here this week though.
DIA_Ambrosia_WhoAreYou_03_02: I can explain it to you in many ways, my dear...
DIA_Ambrosia_WhoAreYou_15_03: For now, I suggest the simplest one.
DIA_Ambrosia_WhoAreYou_03_04: Eh, you don't know how to have fun. I'm Ambrosia, and as you can easily see, I work in the brothel.
DIA_Ambrosia_Work_03_02: We've been getting more and more visitors from the rich neighborhood lately.
DIA_Ambrosia_Work_03_03: Apparently, they're not such saints they think they are.
DIA_Ambrosia_Work_03_06: I could have rotted in the village, but at least I don't go hungry. It's hard to get a good job in the city these days, and this one... at least it's simple!
